title: Turkey and vegetable lasagne
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 onion, diced', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '570g minced turkey', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '515g tomato puree', '350ml water', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon Italian herb seasoning', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '500g peeled and cubed butternut squash', '285g fresh spinach', '425g ricotta cheese', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '175g grated mozzarella cheese, divided', '9 lasagne sheets', '2 courgettes, sliced lengthways']
